Header: Army Officer Invited to Deliver Lecture
Content: Lieutenant Colonel M. B. B. N Herath, General Staff Officer I (Admin) of 14 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - West at the invitation of the E - BEYOND Management in Maharagama, a private software company delivered a comprehensive lecture on current security scenario, positive attitudes and approaches and leadership. The senior management of the company wanted this lecture be given to the most senior officials, top management officials and assistant managers as all of them wanted to get an update on the developments as well as training modules of the Army for civil personnel.
